## Inputs and Outputs
```{r standard_code_chunk, echo=FALSE}
# create side panels
ui <- fluidPage(
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput(
        inputId = "action",
        label = "Parameters",
        choices=("Created" = "date_created", "Updated" = "date_updated", "Resolved" = "date_resolved"),
        selected = "date_created"
      ),
      
      sliderInput(
        inputId = "start_date_resolved", 
        label = "Choose a start date", 
        value = as.Date(max(Jira_reduced$date_created)-365), 
        min = as.Date(min(Jira_reduced$date_created)), 
        max = as.Date(max(Jira_reduced$date_created)-182)
      ),
      
      sliderInput(inputId = "bins", label = "Choose the number of bins", value = 12, min = 6, max = 60, step = 6),
  ),
  mainPanel(
    plotOutput("histogram")
  )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$histogram <- renderPlot({
    ggplot()+
      geom_histogram(
      aes(
          x = as.Date(as.POSIXct(array(c(data.matrix((Jira_reduced[,input$action]))))*24*60*60, origin="1970-01-01")),
          fill = Jira_reduced$Priority
      ), bins = input$bins
  )+
  xlim(as.Date(input$start_date_resolved),
max(as.Date(as.POSIXct(array(c(data.matrix((Jira_reduced[,input$action]))))*24*60*60, origin="1970-01-01")))) +
  xlab(input$action)+
  ylab("Count") +
  labs(fill = "Priority")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
